titleStmt.title: Christ revealed: or The Old Testament explained A treatise of the types and shadowes of our Saviour contained throughout the whole Scripture: all opened and made usefull for the benefit of Gods Church. By Thomas Tailor D.D. late preacher at Aldermanbury. Perfected by himselfe before his death.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
Jemmat, William, 1596?-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for R. Dawlman and L. Fawne at the signe of the Brazen serpent in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the Brazen serpent in Pauls Churchyard
